name: Soul Scraper Demo
description:
Player/Tester Read me

KeyBinds:

W - Raise paddle

S - Lower paddle

A - Rotate paddle left

D - Rotate paddle right

H - Hide/show UI

P - Pause/play game

R - Restart current section

UI Contents

- Near Player paddle = Player HP

- Near Enemy center = Enemy HP

- Lower Left = (Timer, Wave Cycle Repetitions)

Player Objectives

The player objective is to collide with smooth circle spheres. This is to cause damage to the monster in the center and destroy them. 

The player must avoid spiky objects. If you die the game will restart. If you destroy the monster you will
